What ruined this collection for me was that a lot of the design books were not scanned at all, but badly photographed. Thank you for the good scans, but I do wish future collections are curated better. 

Of the design books, only 5 out of 13 files are okay.  The rest - meh.

[ok] (Rockport) Letterhead & Logo Design 4.pdf 
[ok] Design For Web Developers - Colour And Layout For The Artistically Overwhelmed (Dmxzone-2005).pdf
[photographed] Don't Make Me Think - A Common Sense Approach To Web Usability (By Steve Krug - New Riders, 2000).pdf
[badly scanned] TOO LIGHT, NOTICEABLE PAGE CURL Fashion Illustrator 150dpi.pdf*
[ok] Logo Font & Lettering Bible 150dpi.pdf
[badly scanned] New.Riders.Designing.With.Web.Standards - Zeldman.pdf
[ok] Penguin Books - Color; A course in mastering the art of mixing colors - Betty Edwards.pdf
[photographed] Rockport - Logolounge. 2000 International Identities by Leading Designers.pdf

Continued:
[photographed]  Rockport - The Best of Newspaper Design - 25th edition.pdf
[ok] Rockport,.Logos - Making a Strong Mark - 150 Strategies for Logos.....pdf
[photographed]  Rockport.Publishers.Best.of.Brochure.Design.8.pdf
[photographed]  Rotovision.Digital.Color.And.Type.Apr.2002.from.GFXworld.org.pdf
[photographed]  DUPLICATE FILE, SAME AS LOGO LOUNGE 2000 ETC. [graphic design] Logo Lounge 2.pdf

The rest is mostly okay.
